skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns before attacking.

If 5 or more enemies are alive, does the following attack instead:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking.
skills.name: Murderer's Craft
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Then attacks all enemies inflicting damage equal to 15% of their MAX HP if the first hit kills an enemy. This second hit cannot be critical.
skills.name: Ripe for Slaughter
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 10% for each enemy alive. Stacks up to 100%.
skills.name: Corrosive Smog
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
